0.15.name: wordpress/blurbs
0.15.description: The blurbs plugin allows you to add user made 'blurbs' of text to a post, page, or template. This is particularly useful if your WordPress theme is easily broken, and has many small pieces of text in it, or if you want to have a piece of text on the site repeated many times. This plugin uses the shortcode API to embed blurbs in posts and pages.
